review: Setup was quick and easy.  To install, plug it into the TV's HDMI port, and connect the power source and you're done.  Once the unit turns on, just choose your wireless network, give it the password if any, and you're done with the basic setup.  The unit will check for updates once connected to the internet and then boot up.  There is a useful introduction video that plays when you turn the unit on for the first time to help you get acquainted with the controls and menus and you're set.  I had installed apps and was watching shows in just a few minutes.My favorite part is that the unit is small enough to hide behind the TV and the remote doesn't need to be in the line of sight.  If you want to keep your setup looking streamlined, the Amazon Fire Stick is awesome.
